title: Black screen when loading into game
body:
Hey guys,

I seem to have this problem where whenever champ select is finished and I get into the loading screen, my screen turns black. The black screen persists throughout the entire game. I can hear in-game sounds and still alt-tab out, but the black screen is still  there. I've tried reinstalling League and of course, restarting my PC. Is there anything else I can do or is this a bug? Any help is appreciated!

Specs: 

i7-6700HQ

GTX 970M

1TB HDD, 128GB SSD

16GB RAM

Windows 10

replies.body: Most of the time those black screens after the loading screen can be a sign that you might need to update some of your drivers. Double check your graphics drivers, and go ahead and run through the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just to cover the rest of your bases.
